question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.

You have received a letter from your bank, asking you to acknowledge receipt of a new bank card. However, the card was missing from the envelope.

Write a letter to the bank's head office. In your letter:

explain why you are writing
express concern about the missing card
ask them what they intend to do
You do NOT need to write your own address.

Begin your letter as:
text: I am writing to inform you about the absence of my credit card in the parcel delivered by your bank branch yesterday. Since I was not at home to receive the parcel in person, the missing item  could not be detected immediately.

After completing all necessary documentaion for my newly opened account on last Thursday, I was informed that all personal effects related to the account would be delivered to my residential address after five days which I did receive, but without the credit card. This is very worrisome as I feel exposed, and my account at  a high risk of being hijacked and all my savings cleaned out due to the sensitivity of the details inscribed on the card
I look forward to hearing from you soon, in order to let me in on your plans to get the card across, my plan to travel is about to be wrenched!
